Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launch_snowbal: Wirft den Schneeball in Richtung des Ziels.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launc: Launch the snowball toward the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launch_snowbal: Der Schneeball rollt mit 175% von Tusks Bewegungstempo.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launc: The snowball travels at 175% of Tusk's movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launch_snowbal: Trägt keine Illusionen, aber Meepo-Klone und andere Einheiten, die Tusk kontrolliert.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launc: Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fortunes_end: Kanalisiert für bis zu 2,9 Sekunden Oracles Macht in einen Blitz zerstörerischer Energie. Wenn der Blitz den anvisierten Gegner trifft, wird diesem Schaden zugefügt und in dessen unmittelbarer Umgebung ein Purge-Effekt ausgelöst. Der Effekt dauert genau so lange an, wie der Zauber kanalisiert wurde.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_for: Channels Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy for up to 2.9 seconds. When released the bolt strikes the targeted enemy, dealing damage and purging in an area around them. The purge duration is equal to the time spent channeling.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fates_edict_: Oracle verzaubert das Ziel, unterbindet dessen Angriffe, gewährt ihm 100% Magieresistenz und erhöht den Schaden, den es von anderen Schadensarten erleidet. Kann sowohl auf Verbündete als auch Gegner angewendet werden.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fat: Oracle enraptures the target, rendering them unable to attack, granting them 100% spell resistance, and increasing the damage they take from other damage types. Can be cast on both allies and enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_purifying_fl: Lässt alle Unreinheiten des Ziels verbrennen, was diesem zunächst schweren Schaden zufügt, danach aber eine gewisse Zeit Lebensregeneration pro Sekunde verleiht. Kann auf Verbündete und Gegner angewendet werden.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_pur: Burns away impurities from the target, dealing heavy damage and causing them to regenerate life each second over the duration. Can be cast on both allies and enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_false_promis: Ändert vorübergehend das Schicksal eines Verbündeten, sodass alle Schadens-, Heilungs- und Regenerationseffekte auf diesen bis zum Ende der Wirkdauer von False Promise verzögert werden. Das Ziel wird außerdem unsichtbar, auch während es sich bewegt oder angreift. Entfernt beim Wirken alle negativen Statuseffekte vom Ziel.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fal: Temporarily alters the target ally's destiny, delaying all damage, healing and regeneration effects on them until False Promise ends. Ally is granted invisibility while attacking and moving. Removes all negative status effects when applied.
Tokens.lobby_game_mode_required_desc: Diese Lobby benötigt das angepasste Spiel \"%s1\"
Tokens.[english]lobby_game_mode_required_desc: This lobby requires the custom game \"%s1\"
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_treant_natures_gui: Nature's Guise wird entfernt, wenn nicht in der Nähe eines Baumes.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_treant_na: Nature's Guise will be removed when not near a tree.
Tokens.UI_TELEPORT_REQUIRES_HALT_desc: Teleportationen können nur noch von einem \"Stopp\"-Befehl unterbrochen werden.
Tokens.[english]UI_TELEPORT_REQUIRES_HALT_desc: Teleporting will no longer get interrupted by any order except stop.
Tokens.custom_game_confirm_install_desc: Diesen angepassten Modus herunterladen und installieren?
Tokens.[english]custom_game_confirm_install_des: Download and install this custom game mode?
Tokens.league_premium_desc: Bei Premiumligen erhöhen Ticketkäufe im Spiel das Preisgeld.
Tokens.[english]league_premium_desc: Premium Leagues divert a portion of their in-game ticket sales directly into their prize pool.
Tokens.Comp_223_PG_schedule6textcustom3_text: Abgesehen von MYM, die bereits ausgeschieden sind, haben alle Teams noch eine kleine Chance, sich zu qualifizieren. Angesichts der 4 oder 5 Spiele, die noch ausgetragen werden müssen, scheinen 8 Siege die magische Zahl zu sein. Der Kampf um die ersten 2 Positionen wird ebenfalls erbittert sein.
Tokens.[english]Comp_223_PG_schedule6textcustom: Aside from MYM, already being eliminated, all teams have a small chance of qualifying still. Having between 4 and 5 matches to play, it looks like 8 wins is going to be the safe number. Battle for top 2 is also going to be a tough one.
Tokens.Comp_223_PG_schedule6textcustom4_text: Cloud 9 (vs Dog) and Empire (vs C9) only lost one game. Na'vi (Lost twice to Empire), Alliance (L to C9 and VP) and Dog (L to EG and Alliance), are all 6-2. Alliance-Na'vi is going to be the first match played this week, and that might ruin one of these teams' possibilities of a top 2 finish.
Tokens.[english]Comp_223_PG_schedule6textcustom: Cloud 9 (vs Dog) and Empire (vs C9) only lost one game. Na'vi (Lost twice to Empire), Alliance (L to C9 and VP) and Dog (L to EG and Alliance), are all 6-2. Alliance-Na'vi is going to be the first match played this week, and that might ruin one of these teams' possibilities of a top 2 finish.
Tokens.Comp_223_PG_schedule6textcustom5_text: Struggling at the bottom, everyone is hoping on EG (5-4) to keep on losing. Being the only team with more than 2 losses in the top 6, RoX, Fnatic, Liquid, VP and to a lesser extent, Sigma, can only hope to get a winning streak that allows them to surpass them. EG-Liquid on monday will be a must watch.
Tokens.[english]Comp_223_PG_schedule6textcustom: Struggling at the bottom, everyone is hoping on EG (5-4) to keep on losing. Being the only team with more than 2 losses in the top 6, RoX, Fnatic, Liquid, VP and to a lesser extent, Sigma, can only hope to get a winning streak that allows them to surpass them. EG-Liquid on monday will be a must watch.
Tokens.Comp_223_PG_schedule6textcustom6_text: Team Liquid wird in 5 Spielen antreten, Na'vi und VP jeweils in 3. Sigma und Alliance werden jeweils 2 Spiele austragen und Team Dog, EG und C9 jeweils nur einmal spielen.
Tokens.[english]Comp_223_PG_schedule6textcustom: Team Liquid will play 5 matches, Na'vi and VP will play 3. Sigma and Alliance 2, and Team Dog, EG and C9 will play 1.

Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_openingtextcustom1_text: Erwerben Sie Ihr Ticket und schließen Sie sich tausenden Fans live in Frankfurt an
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_openingtextcustom1: Get your ticket and join thousands of fans live in Frankfurt
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_toctextcustom20_te: 18 Bonds of Madness Lifestealer Set - Video Preview
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_splash_eventtextcustom2_tex: DIE BESTEN TEAMS, ZEHNTAUSENDE VON FANS, EIN ENTSCHEIDENDER MOMENT
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_splash_eventtextcu: THE BEST TEAMS, TENS OF THOUSANDS OF FANS, ONE DEFINING MOMENT
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_eventinfotextcustom2_text: Am 28. und 29. Juni wird die Commerzbank-Arena in Frankfurt, Deutschland in eine Oase für Dota 2-Fans verwandelt. Die besten Teams weltweit werden vor den Augen tausender Fans um ein Preisgeld in Höhe von 150.000 US-Dollar kämpfen, welches sich dank der Finanzierung durch die Community noch erhöhen wird.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_eventinfotextcusto: On June 28th and 29th, the Commerzbank-Arena in Frankfurt, Germany will be transformed into a haven for Dota 2 fans. The best teams in the world will fight it out in front of thousand of fans for a prize pool of US $150,000, set to increase even more thanks to community funding.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_eventinfotextcustom3_text: Erwerben Sie Ihr Ticket und schließen Sie sich tausenden Fans live auf esl-one.com an
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_eventinfotextcusto: Get your ticket and join thousands of fans live at the event on esl-one.com
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_teamstextcustom2_text: Acht Teams haben es diesen Juni zur ESL One Frankfurt geschafft - zwei von ihnen wurden direkt eingeladen, während sechs Teams sich ihren Weg durch die schwierige Qualifikation bahnen mussten.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_teamstextcustom2_t: Eight teams will make it to the ESL One Frankfurt this June, two of them received a direct invite to the tournament while six have to fight their way through difficult qualifiers.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_splash_stretchgoalstextcust: UNTERSTÜTZEN SIE DIE ESL ONE FRANKFURT UND SCHALTEN SIE SACHEN FREI
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_splash_stretchgoal: SUPPORT ESL ONE FRANKFURT AND UNLOCK NEW GOODIES
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_stretchgoalstextcustom35_te: Klicken Sie auf eine Stufe, um mehr zu erfahren.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_stretchgoalstextcu: Click on a tier to see more information.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_stretch1textcustom2_text: Benutzen Sie diesen Gegenstand, um die Anzahl an Battle Points, die Sie verdienen, für 6 Tage um 125% zu erhöhen. Zusätzlich werden Sie anderen Spielern 25% mehr Battle Points bescheren.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_stretch1textcustom: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points by 125% for 6 days. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 25% bonus to their Battle Points rate.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_stretch2textcustom2_text: Tausende von Fans, die besten Dota 2-Teams, ein entscheidender Moment. Unserer Reise nach Frankfurt beginnt hier. In der Ferne liegt die Arena, in der ein Team zum ultimativen Champion gekrönt wird.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_stretch2textcustom: Thousands of fans, the best Dota 2 teams, One defining moment. Our journey to Frankfurt begins here. In the distance lies the arena where one team will be crowned the ultimate champion.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_stretch3textcustom2_text: Tausende Fans, die besten Dota 2-Teams, ein entscheidender Augenblick. Das \"ESL One\"-HUD wird die Spieler und Fans dieses Jahr auf Ihrer Reise nach Frankfurt gleichermaßen begleiten. Das HUD hat einen minimalistischen Look, einen angepassten Tag-/Nachtzyklus und angepasste Beleuchtungsebenen.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_stretch3textcustom: Thousands of fans, the best Dota 2 teams, One defining moment. The ESL One HUD will accompany players and fans alike on their journey to Frankfurt this year. The HUD features a minimalist look, custom day/night cycle and custom lighting layers.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_stretch4textcustom2_text: Dieser mysteriöse Ward hat den Aufstieg und den Sturz von Zivilisationen seit Äonen miterlebt und setzt seine Beobachtungen auf dem Schlachtfeld fort. Dieses Relikt dient ohne das Wissen seines Handhabers einem der Menschheit unbekannten Meister. In die Klinge ist eine kleine Nachricht eingraviert: \"Ehre gibt es nur im Tod.\"
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_stretch4textcustom: This mysterious ward has witnessed the rise and fall of civilizations for aeons, and continues it’s watch over the battlefield. Unbeknownst to it’s wielders, this relic serves a master unknown to man. Inscribed on the blade is a small passage reading: “There is only glory in death.”
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_stretch5textcustom2_text: Raigor Stonehoofs Monolith zieht seine Kraft aus den Strahlen der Sonne und des Mondes und ist mit der Energie getränkt, die es bedarf, um es mit der kriechenden Fäulnis der Dire-Streitmacht aufzunehmen. In einem geheimen Ablauf von den Nishai-Waffenschmieden erzeugt, ist diese beeindruckende Ausrüstung von denen gefürchtet, die im Schatten verweilen.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_stretch5textcustom: Raigor Stonehoof’s monolith draws it’s power from the rays of the sun and the moon, imbuing it with the energy to counter the creeping corruption of Dire forces. Forged by a secret order of Nishai weapon smiths, it’s a formidable armament feared by those who dwell in the shadows.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_stretch7textcustom2_text: To lose one's own body, have your will shattered and have your life force imprisoned within that of a cursed abomination is a steep price to pay, yet that is the fate that befell a certain wizard who underestimated the madness of N'aix. Two minds as one and resigned to his fate, the vengeful wizard beckoned his vessel to cover his body with armor and unleash unspeakable horror on anyone who crossed his path. Within his twisted mind, a thought echoes over and over again: “I will share my pain with you.”
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_stretch7textcustom: To lose one's own body, have your will shattered and have your life force imprisoned within that of a cursed abomination is a steep price to pay, yet that is the fate that befell a certain wizard who underestimated the madness of N'aix. Two minds as one and resigned to his fate, the vengeful wizard beckoned his vessel to cover his body with armor and unleash unspeakable horror on anyone who crossed his path. Within his twisted mind, a thought echoes over and over again: “I will share my pain with you.”
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_stretch7videotextc: Bonds Of Madness Set Video Preview
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_splash_qualifierstextcustom: VIER REGIONEN KÄMPFEN UM DIE VERBLEIBENDEN SECHS PLÄTZE BEI DER HAUPTVERANSTALTUNG IN FRANKFURT
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_splash_qualifierst: FOUR REGIONS COMPETE FOR THE REMAINING SIX SLOTS TO THE MAIN EVENT IN FRANKFURT
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_splash_teamstextcu: TEAM PROFILES FOR THE MAIN EVENT ATTENDEES
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_alliancetextcustom2_text: The Alliance haben die Dota 2-Szene seit ihrer Gründung im Jahr 2013 im Sturm erobert. Mit beispielhaftem Spiel und taktischer Überlegenheit gewann das Team ein Turnier nach dem anderen und hat sich durch seinen Sieg bei The International 3 in die Geschichtsbücher eingetragen.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_alliancetextcustom: The Alliance took the Dota 2 scene by storm with their creation in 2013. With exemplary play and tactical superiority, the team won tournament after tournament and wrote their name in the history books winning The International 3.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_navitextcustom2_text: Natus Vincere is eins der beständigsten Teams der Welt. Das in 2010 gegründete Team gewann The International 1 und hat sich auch in jedem weiteren Turnier, in dem sie teilgenommen haben, unglaublich gut geschlagen.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_navitextcustom2_te: Natus Vincere is one of the most consistent teams in the world. Created in 2010, the team won The International 1 and proceeded to perform incredibly in each major tournament they attended afterwards.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_splash_predictions: MAKE YOUR PREDICTIONS FOR THE MAIN EVENT

Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_predictionstextcus: All predictions are now unlocked. Please make your predictions before the main event starts on the 28th June!

Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Autoattack: Automatisch zu nahen Gegner bewegen und diese angreifen.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Autoattac: Automatically move to and attack enemies that are nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_AutoattackAfterSpe: Falls nicht angewählt, bleibt der Held nach dem Einsetzen einer Fähigkeit an Ort und Stelle und wartet auf neue Befehle.

Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_AutoSelectSummons: Sobald der Held neue Einheiten beschwört, werden diese zur aktuellen Auswahl hinzugefügt.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_AutoSelec: When new units are summoned by the Hero, they are added to your selection group.
Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_DoubleTap: Bei Doppelklick auf eine Fähigkeit oder einen Gegenstand bzw. bei doppeltem Drücken des Hotkeys wird der Effekt auf den eigenen Helden angewendet.

Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_UnifiedOrders: Ist die Strg-Taste gedrückt während ein Befehl gesendet wird, so wird dieser an alle kontrollierten Einheiten gesendet.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_UnifiedOr: Holding down CTRL when issuing an order will send it to all units you control.
Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_TeleportStop: Bewegungs- und Zauberbefehle brechen laufende Teleportationen nicht ab. Nur Teleport Scrolls und Boots of Travel.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_TeleportS: Moving or casting a spell won't cancel a teleport in progress. Applies only to Teleport Scrolls or Boots of Travel.
Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_BroadcasterStats: Zeigt beim Zuschauen eines Spiels das aktuelle Statistikmenü des Kommentators.

Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Deceleration: Die Geschwindigkeit, mit der die Kamera nach einer Bewegung zum Stillstand kommt. Höhere Werte führen zu einem schnelleren Stopp.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Decelerat: The speed at which the camera comes to rest after moving.  Larger number equates to a faster stop.
Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Screenshake: Manche Zauber und Betäubungen lassen die Kamera wackeln.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Screensha: Some spells and stuns shake the camera.

Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_SmoothDrag: Beim Zuschauen können Sie die Kamera mit der mittleren Maustaste ruckfrei bewegen.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_SmoothDra: When spectating, dragging the camera with the middle-mouse button allows for smooth camera motion.

Tokens.DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_MinimapDrawHeroes: Wenn Sie die \"Alt\"-Taste gedrückt halten, wird anstelle des Heldennamens ein Heldensymbol in der Minkarte angezeigt.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Note1: Auf sich selbst angewendete Cyclones ignorieren Zauberimmunität.

Tokens.Crate_Already_Unlocked_Desc: Dieser Schatz ist nicht verschlossen und kann jederzeit geöffnet werden.
Tokens.[english]Crate_Already_Unlocked_Desc: This treasure is unlocked and may be opened at any time.
Tokens.Crate_Purchase_And_Open_Desc: Beim Kauf dieses Schatzes erhalten Sie eines der oben aufgelisteten Sets. Jedes Mal, wenn Sie den Schatz kaufen, erhalten Sie ein anderes Set. Es besteht eine Chance, dass der von Ihnen gekaufte Schatz einen der links gelisteten seltenen Gegenstände enthält.
Tokens.[english]Crate_Purchase_And_Open_Desc: Purchase this treasure and you will receive one of the sets listed above. Each time you purchase the treasure you will earn a different set. Your treasure also has a chance of containing the rare items listed to the left.

Tokens.DOTA_Recruitment_Steps:
- Fügen Sie Ihrer Freundesliste Freunde hinzu.

- Wählen Sie links unten Freunde aus und senden Sie ihnen Rekrutierungseinladungen.

- Verdienen Sie Rekrutierungslevel, wenn Ihre Rekruten spielen.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Recruitment_Steps:
- Add friends to your friends list.

- Select friends from the left panel below and send them recruitment invites.

- Earn recruitment levels as your recruits play the game.

Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_CameraGrip: Halten Sie die Taste gedrückt und ziehen Sie an der Welt, um die Kameraansicht zu bewegen. Dies kann ebenso über die mittlere Maustaste erreicht werden.

Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ActivateGlyph: Aktiviert die Glyphe der Verstärkung, um Ihre Gebäude für 5 Sekunden unverwundbar zu machen.

Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Group: Definieren Sie ein Tastaturkürzel für eine Gruppe von Einheiten. Um ein Tastaturkürzel festzulegen, müssen Sie die gewünschte Gruppe auswählen, die \"Strg\"-Taste gedrückt halten und eine der Gruppenhotkeys drücken.

Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Legacy: Diese Tastenbelegung orientiert sich an Dota 1. Die Hotkeys der Fähigkeiten unterscheiden sich je nach Held.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Legacy: Use all hotkeys associated with the Dota 1.  Ability hotkeys will vary per Hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Quickcast: Bei Drücken der Schnellzaubertaste wird die entsprechende Fähigkeit sofort an der aktuellen Position des Mauszeigers angewendet.

Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Autocast: Umschalten, um automatisch Fähigkeiten zu zaubern, sobald sie bereit sind. Wirkt nur bei einer begrenzten Anzahl an Fähigkeiten.

Tokens.DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ItemQuickcast: Bei Drücken der Schnellzaubertaste wird der entsprechende Gegenstand sofort an der aktuellen Position des Mauszeigers benutzt.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abaddon_borrowed_t: 35%% alles erlittenen Schadens wird zu Abaddon umgeleitet.

Tokens.StoreBanner_Text_BindingsOfDeepMagma: Aus der Hitze tief unten wird oben Stärke
Tokens.[english]StoreBanner_Text_BindingsOfDeep: From heat below comes strength above
Tokens.StoreBanner_Text_DemonicVessel: Die ganze Welt soll den Fluch spüren
Tokens.[english]StoreBanner_Text_DemonicVessel: Let them all fear the curse
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_chinatextcustom8_text: Kampf um den letzten verfügbaren Platz
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_chinatextcustom8_t: To compete for the final spot
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_teamdogtextcustom2_text: Team Dog ist in der Dota 2-Szene ein relativ neuer Name, aber die Spieler sind prominent. Das aus Spielern von Sigma.int und LGD.int bestehende Team hat seine Stärke schnell bewiesen und liefert sich ein Kopf-an-Kopf-Rennen mit den besten Teams. Der unglaubliche Durchmarsch in der europäischen Qualifikation sicherte Team Dog einen Platz bei der ESL One Frankfurt.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_teamdogtextcustom2: Team Dog is quite a new name to the Dota 2 scene, but it's players are well known. Made up of a mixture of players from Sigma.int and LGD.int, the squad quickly proved their strength and went head to head with the best. Team Dog's amazing run in the European Qualifiers allowed them to secure a position at ESL One Frankfurt.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_fnatictextcustom2_text: Fnatic ist eins der beständigsten Dota 2-Teams. Das Team ist zusammen durch dick und dünn gegangen und besiegt nach wie vor einen Gegner nach dem anderen. Das aus einigen der bemerkenswertesten Leuten der Dota 2-Szene bestehende Team ist bei jedem Turnier, an dem es teilnimmt, der Publikumsliebling. Fnatic hat sich seinen Platz bei der ESL One Frankfurt durch die europäische Qualifikation gesichert.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_fnatictextcustom2_: Fnatic is one of the most consistent teams in Dota 2. The team has stuck together through good and bad and still stand together defeating opponent after opponent. Made up of some of the most notable people in the competitive Dota 2 scene, they are a fan favorite at any tournament they attend. Fnatic secured their position at ESL One Frankfurt through the European Qualifier.
Tokens.Comp_223_PG_schedule8textcustom5_text: The super weekend will feature the last few matches everyone needs to determine their final standings. Whether it's teams trying to secure first place, clinging to last hopes to get into the finals or making sure they don't fall down to 7th place or less, this is where the group stage ends. After this, the top 6 teams will face each other at Dreamhack Summer for a shot at a prizepool of over $200,000
Tokens.[english]Comp_223_PG_schedule8textcustom: The super weekend will feature the last few matches everyone needs to determine their final standings. Whether it's teams trying to secure first place, clinging to last hopes to get into the finals or making sure they don't fall down to 7th place or less, this is where the group stage ends. After this, the top 6 teams will face each other at Dreamhack Summer for a shot at a prizepool of over $200,000
Tokens.Comp_223_PG_schedule7textcustom3_text: Cloud 9 and Empire only depend on themselves to secure top 2. Cloud 9 has the tie breaker advantage on Empire, so if the latter want to finish in first place, they will have to hope that Cloud 9 loses one game.
Tokens.[english]Comp_223_PG_schedule7textcustom: Cloud 9 and Empire only depend on themselves to secure top 2. Cloud 9 has the tie breaker advantage on Empire, so if the latter want to finish in first place, they will have to hope that Cloud 9 loses one game.
Tokens.Comp_223_PG_schedule7textcustom4_text: Close behind, both Alliance and Team Dog are waiting for anyone at the top to slip, and Alliance can force that to happen when they play Empire on Wednesday. Dog on the other hand will have some tough challenges in Na'vi and RoX.KIS
Tokens.[english]Comp_223_PG_schedule7textcustom: Close behind, both Alliance and Team Dog are waiting for anyone at the top to slip, and Alliance can force that to happen when they play Empire on Wednesday. Dog on the other hand will have some tough challenges in Na'vi and RoX.KIS
Tokens.Comp_223_PG_schedule7textcustom5_text: Speaking of Na'vi, them and EG are only 1 loss away from falling into the dangerous territory below the 6th place. RoX.KIS and Fnatic will be waiting for either of these teams to slip and if they can be consistent enough, we could have a last minute lead change and some surprise upsets.

RoX.KIS and Fnatic will be waiting for either of these teams to slip and if they can be consistent enough, we could have a last minute lead change and some surprise upsets.
Tokens.Comp_223_PG_schedule7textcustom6_text: Fnatic, Alliance und Rox.KIS werden jeweils 3 Spiele austragen. Empire, Team Dog und Na'Vi treten jeweils in 2 Partien an. Cloud 9, VP und Sigma.INT spielen jeweils nur einmal.
Tokens.[english]Comp_223_PG_schedule7textcustom: Fnatic, Alliance and Rox.KIS will play 3 matches. Empire, Team Dog and Na'vi will play two. Cloud 9, VP and Sigma.INT will only play one.

Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoonvideotextcustom1_tex: Red Moon Vlog: ESL-Kompendium-Gegenstände (Hinter den Kulissen)

Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 1
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 1
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom2_text: Das ESL One Frankfurt-Kompendium ist gerade im Dota 2-Shop erschienen, für das der Red Moon Workshop ein paar großartige Gegenstände erstellt hat. Wir haben uns mit ihnen in Verbindung gesetzt und ihnen ein paar Fragen zu ihrer Arbeit und ihren Leben als Workshop-Designer gestellt.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom: The ESL One Frankfurt Compendium just hit the Dota 2 in-game store, with the Red Moon Workshop having created some amazing items for it. We got in touch and asked them a few questions about their work and the life of a workshop artist.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom3_text: ESL: Hallo Leute - könnt ihr euch für diejenigen, die euch noch nicht kennen, vorstellen?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom: ESL: Hello, guys - could you introduce yourself to us for those who don't already know you?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom4_text: Bounch: Hi! I’m Bounch. I’m the 3D artist for Red Moon. My primary job here is to encourage Andrew’s crazy ideas and to make sure Oroboros develops a nervous twitch from the concept feedback I give him. Really, though, I build the cosmetics in 3D and paint them up for use in the game. It’s a tough but rewarding practice.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom: Bounch: Hi! I’m Bounch. I’m the 3D artist for Red Moon. My primary job here is to encourage Andrew’s crazy ideas and to make sure Oroboros develops a nervous twitch from the concept feedback I give him. Really, though, I build the cosmetics in 3D and paint them up for use in the game. It’s a tough but rewarding practice.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom5_text: Oroboros: Hello, I'm Oroboros and I'm the dedicated 2D artist for Red Moon, along with a half dozen other tasks (marketing, talking to clients, taking care of the social aspects of Red Moon). My primary job is to drive Bounch crazy with overly detailed concepts that exceed poly limits and convince Andrew to commit to impossible SFM projects.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom: Oroboros: Hello, I'm Oroboros and I'm the dedicated 2D artist for Red Moon, along with a half dozen other tasks (marketing, talking to clients, taking care of the social aspects of Red Moon). My primary job is to drive Bounch crazy with overly detailed concepts that exceed poly limits and convince Andrew to commit to impossible SFM projects.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom6_text: Andrew: Ich bin Andrew Helenek, ein Animateur bei Red Moon Workshop.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon1textcustom: Andrew: I’m Andrew Helenek, animator of Red Moon Workshop.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 2
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 2
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom2_text: ESL: Wie habt ihr euch alle kennengelernt?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom: ESL: How did you all meet?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom3_text: Bounch: I can field this one. It starts with Polycount. We were all members of the website and had each individually decided to attempt making cosmetics. I had done one with a close friend for the Polycount contest in December 2012 and really enjoyed making art for a game I really enjoyed, so I decided to continue doing more, looking for more people to collab with.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom: Bounch: I can field this one. It starts with Polycount. We were all members of the website and had each individually decided to attempt making cosmetics. I had done one with a close friend for the Polycount contest in December 2012 and really enjoyed making art for a game I really enjoyed, so I decided to continue doing more, looking for more people to collab with.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom4_text: Through a friend of the site I was introduced to Oroboros, hearing that he was looking for someone to work with for the 3D side. After talking, we decided I would do the Lycan set he had originally concepted for the Polycount contest. We managed to finish without hating each other at the end so we decided to work together more. During all of this, I had gone to the GDC Polycount party (yes, lots of Polycount here, haha) and while I was sitting at the bar I found myself in conversation with someone that was also involved in Dota 2 cosmetics along with his friend Andrew.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom: Through a friend of the site I was introduced to Oroboros, hearing that he was looking for someone to work with for the 3D side. After talking, we decided I would do the Lycan set he had originally concepted for the Polycount contest. We managed to finish without hating each other at the end so we decided to work together more. During all of this, I had gone to the GDC Polycount party (yes, lots of Polycount here, haha) and while I was sitting at the bar I found myself in conversation with someone that was also involved in Dota 2 cosmetics along with his friend Andrew.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom5_text: I went over to the table where Andrew was sitting and introduced myself, letting him know how much of a fan I was of Cluckles. He responded kindly saying that he really liked the Phantom Lancer set I had done for the contest, which got us to talking about a future collaboration. It seemed obvious enough to me at that point to combine our skill sets, introduce Andrew and Oroboros, and wreak some havoc together.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom: I went over to the table where Andrew was sitting and introduced myself, letting him know how much of a fan I was of Cluckles. He responded kindly saying that he really liked the Phantom Lancer set I had done for the contest, which got us to talking about a future collaboration. It seemed obvious enough to me at that point to combine our skill sets, introduce Andrew and Oroboros, and wreak some havoc together.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom6_text: Oroboros: Primarily out of frustration. I was trying to break into the Dota 2 scene but was unable to find a reliable modeler to bring my concepts to life. One after the other they'd disappear halfway through the process, which made me wonder if I'd ever find a reliable partner. I happened to be working at the same company as the head of Polycount, who heard out my frustrations and amicably introduced me to Bounch and the Polycount community. Following a few months of collaboration with Bounch, I was also introduced to Andrew, who came in to address our animation needs.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon2textcustom: Oroboros: Primarily out of frustration. I was trying to break into the Dota 2 scene but was unable to find a reliable modeler to bring my concepts to life. One after the other they'd disappear halfway through the process, which made me wonder if I'd ever find a reliable partner. I happened to be working at the same company as the head of Polycount, who heard out my frustrations and amicably introduced me to Bounch and the Polycount community. Following a few months of collaboration with Bounch, I was also introduced to Andrew, who came in to address our animation needs.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon3textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 3
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon3textcustom: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 3
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon3textcustom2_text: ESL: Was habt ihr alle gemacht, bevor ihr angefangen habt als Workshop-Designer zu arbeiten und was hat euch dazu verleitet dies hauptberuflich zu tun?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon3textcustom: ESL: What did you all do before you started work as workshop artists and what made you decide to go full time?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon3textcustom3_text: Bounch: I’ve been in the game industry as a 3D artist since 2007. After dabbling in the workshop first hand for close to a year, I decided I was having way too much fun to only be doing it part time. It was all I thought about. That, and it was really tough to constantly be doing 16 hour days for so long… though to be fair that hasn’t changed as of yet.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon3textcustom: Bounch: I’ve been in the game industry as a 3D artist since 2007. After dabbling in the workshop first hand for close to a year, I decided I was having way too much fun to only be doing it part time. It was all I thought about. That, and it was really tough to constantly be doing 16 hour days for so long… though to be fair that hasn’t changed as of yet.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon3textcustom4_text: Oroboros: I worked in the game industry for six years or so, with my last job being at Sony working on a next gen project that unfortunately got canceled. Following the end of that project, I decided to give full-time Dota 2 workshop a shot as the freedom it offered from a typical 9-5 job was undeniable. I'd been following Valve's workshop scene since TF2 but missed that boat. I wasn't going to take chances this time!
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon3textcustom: Oroboros: I worked in the game industry for six years or so, with my last job being at Sony working on a next gen project that unfortunately got canceled. Following the end of that project, I decided to give full-time Dota 2 workshop a shot as the freedom it offered from a typical 9-5 job was undeniable. I'd been following Valve's workshop scene since TF2 but missed that boat. I wasn't going to take chances this time!
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon3textcustom5_text: Andrew: I was a student, believe it or not. It was my senior year of college and I constantly faced the looming worry of "what do I do once I'm out of academia?" Conveniently, with all that extra time on my hands, I put it all into the workshop, and, needless to say, it paid off. As far as me going full time, it just happened naturally - there was never a moment where I made a decision to go full time.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon3textcustom: Andrew: I was a student, believe it or not. It was my senior year of college and I constantly faced the looming worry of "what do I do once I'm out of academia?" Conveniently, with all that extra time on my hands, I put it all into the workshop, and, needless to say, it paid off. As far as me going full time, it just happened naturally - there was never a moment where I made a decision to go full time.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 4
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 4
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom2_text: ESL: Könntet ihr den Erstellungsprozess für einen Gegenstand ein bisschen beschreiben?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom: ESL: Could you describe the content creation process for an item a bit?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom3_text: Oroboros: I come in at the beginning, middle and end of the process typically. I typically try to come up with a tidbit of lore for each item before starting the concepting process. When a concept feels good, it typically goes to Bounch and we usually have a feedback phase where I get a chance to do paintovers of the model in its WIP state. When the model is completed, I typically collaborate with Andrew and Bounch to pose the set and get a Marmoset render for illustrations and other marketing materials.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom: Oroboros: I come in at the beginning, middle and end of the process typically. I typically try to come up with a tidbit of lore for each item before starting the concepting process. When a concept feels good, it typically goes to Bounch and we usually have a feedback phase where I get a chance to do paintovers of the model in its WIP state. When the model is completed, I typically collaborate with Andrew and Bounch to pose the set and get a Marmoset render for illustrations and other marketing materials.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom4_text: Bounch: Once Oroboros feels confident in his design of the current item, he then passes it off to me. I do slight revisions based on the triangle budget we have available to make it with then start off with the modeling. My primary programs for this phase are Maya and Zbrush, to block out and then detail the model respectively. Once I’m happy with how the high resolution sculpt looks, I take it into a program such as TopoGun or Maya to create the game resolution mesh.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom: Bounch: Once Oroboros feels confident in his design of the current item, he then passes it off to me. I do slight revisions based on the triangle budget we have available to make it with then start off with the modeling. My primary programs for this phase are Maya and Zbrush, to block out and then detail the model respectively. Once I’m happy with how the high resolution sculpt looks, I take it into a program such as TopoGun or Maya to create the game resolution mesh.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom5_text: This can sometimes be difficult due to the polygon limitations imposed by the game engine, but with enough thought and some trickery we can make most things work without going too insane. After this mesh is made, I then paint it up using Photoshop and 3D Coat before rigging and previewing in the game. If it’s a ward or courier, I will pass off the mesh before I start texturing so Andrew can begin his process of bringing it to life.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom: This can sometimes be difficult due to the polygon limitations imposed by the game engine, but with enough thought and some trickery we can make most things work without going too insane. After this mesh is made, I then paint it up using Photoshop and 3D Coat before rigging and previewing in the game. If it’s a ward or courier, I will pass off the mesh before I start texturing so Andrew can begin his process of bringing it to life.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom6_text: Andrew: Covering just my end, the animation side of things. Once Bounch sends me a 3D model, I put bones inside it and create controls to influence those bones. Think of it like a virtual puppet, and I'm its puppeteer creating the illusion of life. But before I animate it, I make sure to find some reference, something from the real world I can use to base the animations off of to make them more relatable and grounded. After I finished the animations, I start testing everything in the game, making sure it works as intended. I get some final critiques from other artists, apply any feedback, polish everything up then finalize and ship it to the workshop.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon4textcustom: Andrew: Covering just my end, the animation side of things. Once Bounch sends me a 3D model, I put bones inside it and create controls to influence those bones. Think of it like a virtual puppet, and I'm its puppeteer creating the illusion of life. But before I animate it, I make sure to find some reference, something from the real world I can use to base the animations off of to make them more relatable and grounded. After I finished the animations, I start testing everything in the game, making sure it works as intended. I get some final critiques from other artists, apply any feedback, polish everything up then finalize and ship it to the workshop.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon5textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 5
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon5textcustom: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 5
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon5textcustom2_text: ESL: Könnt ihr uns euren Alltag beschreiben?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon5textcustom: ESL: Can you take us through the day in your life?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon5textcustom3_text: Bounch: Haha, right now? This might be a bit boring of an answer, but it usually consists of waking up, working, taking a small break for food, maybe playing a game of Dota or CS:GO, working, and then going back to sleep to repeat it all tomorrow. I must say it does feel a bit strange waking up right when the sun is going down sometimes, but right now it’s all about getting cosmetics done so the players have cool stuff to use in game. I’m hoping to make more time in the future to pursue my traditional art and music interests but for now Dota has a firm grip on me.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon5textcustom: Bounch: Haha, right now? This might be a bit boring of an answer, but it usually consists of waking up, working, taking a small break for food, maybe playing a game of Dota or CS:GO, working, and then going back to sleep to repeat it all tomorrow. I must say it does feel a bit strange waking up right when the sun is going down sometimes, but right now it’s all about getting cosmetics done so the players have cool stuff to use in game. I’m hoping to make more time in the future to pursue my traditional art and music interests but for now Dota has a firm grip on me.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon5textcustom4_text: Oroboros: At the moment it's an absolute seesaw, but the average day so far starts late in the afternoon and goes till early morning. We've been working with so many international organizations that it's become necessary to stay up late to keep the communication channels open and our clients happy. I typically reserve a few hours to spend time with my family and get some exercise before heading over to the office to spend a day cranking out concepts. During breaks we try to get outside and enjoy Austin (when we can) and play CS:GO or Dota.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon5textcustom: Oroboros: At the moment it's an absolute seesaw, but the average day so far starts late in the afternoon and goes till early morning. We've been working with so many international organizations that it's become necessary to stay up late to keep the communication channels open and our clients happy. I typically reserve a few hours to spend time with my family and get some exercise before heading over to the office to spend a day cranking out concepts. During breaks we try to get outside and enjoy Austin (when we can) and play CS:GO or Dota.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon5textcustom5_text: Andrew: It’s hard to define a day. The only constant is that I animate whenever I'm awake while taking breaks to play whatever video game everyone else is playing at the moment. I don't really do anything else outside of that - I live and breathe my work.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon5textcustom: Andrew: It’s hard to define a day. The only constant is that I animate whenever I'm awake while taking breaks to play whatever video game everyone else is playing at the moment. I don't really do anything else outside of that - I live and breathe my work.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 6
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 6
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom2_text: ESL: Wie kommt ihr auf die Ideen für die Inhalte, die ihr erstellt? Habt ihr irgendwelche besonderen Inspirationsquellen?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom: ESL: How do you guys come up with the ideas for the content you create? Do you have any specific inspiration sources?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom3_text: Bounch: For me it’s a bit easier since I’m usually fed concepts, but I have ideas too, you know! A lot of my inspiration comes from places like Polycount, CGHub (RIP) and lately Pintrest thanks to the way you can sort and browse through reference that’s already been gathered and manicured by people looking for the same type of inspiration. Someone even made a board specifically for Dota reference:
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom: Bounch: For me it’s a bit easier since I’m usually fed concepts, but I have ideas too, you know! A lot of my inspiration comes from places like Polycount, CGHub (RIP) and lately Pintrest thanks to the way you can sort and browse through reference that’s already been gathered and manicured by people looking for the same type of inspiration. Someone even made a board specifically for Dota reference:
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom5_text: Classic fantasy art such as Frank Frazetta also gives my creative energy a nice boost in a positive direction when I need it.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom: Classic fantasy art such as Frank Frazetta also gives my creative energy a nice boost in a positive direction when I need it.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom6_text: Oroboros: I'm constantly buying art books, browsing websites like Tumblr, Pinterest, deviantART or any other art website I can use to keep myself visually 'fueled' and fresh. Also, referencing lore and browsing existing workshop submissions for heroes is a fun way to get the juices flowing. I spend a lot of time on the Dota 2 wiki.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom: Oroboros: I'm constantly buying art books, browsing websites like Tumblr, Pinterest, deviantART or any other art website I can use to keep myself visually 'fueled' and fresh. Also, referencing lore and browsing existing workshop submissions for heroes is a fun way to get the juices flowing. I spend a lot of time on the Dota 2 wiki.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom7_text: Andrew: Anywhere and everywhere. I find that my best inspiration and ideas come from when I separate myself from the world and simply shut my brain off.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon6textcustom: Andrew: Anywhere and everywhere. I find that my best inspiration and ideas come from when I separate myself from the world and simply shut my brain off.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon7textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 7
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon7textcustom: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 7
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon7textcustom2_text: ESL: Wer von euch hat den schwersten Job?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon7textcustom: ESL: Who has or claims to have the toughest job among you?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon7textcustom3_text: Bounch: I think each of us would make that claim. Though to be honest, it’s always going to change depending on what we’re working on at the time. No part of the process can really be considered ‘easy’, and we all respect each other's talents. Except for Andrew - I’m pretty sure he thinks he’s the king.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon7textcustom: Bounch: I think each of us would make that claim. Though to be honest, it’s always going to change depending on what we’re working on at the time. No part of the process can really be considered ‘easy’, and we all respect each other's talents. Except for Andrew - I’m pretty sure he thinks he’s the king.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon7textcustom4_text: Andrew: Hahaha, we all have our own difficulties when dealing with the workshop - it’s never a smooth process, but the lack of animation guidelines in general makes my job even more difficult.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon7textcustom: Andrew: Hahaha, we all have our own difficulties when dealing with the workshop - it’s never a smooth process, but the lack of animation guidelines in general makes my job even more difficult.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon7textcustom5_text: Oroboros: It really depends on the project and client. Every step of the 'chain' in our process comes with its own set of very unique challenges. My main job is to deliver a design that the community will love, which has been a learning experience all its own.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon7textcustom: Oroboros: It really depends on the project and client. Every step of the 'chain' in our process comes with its own set of very unique challenges. My main job is to deliver a design that the community will love, which has been a learning experience all its own.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 8
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 8
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom2_text: ESL: Das \"ESL One Frankfurt Lifestealer\"-Set hat von der Communty sowohl positives als auch kritisches Feedback bekommen. Welchen Einfluss hat das Feedback der Community auf den Design- und Entwicklungsprozess?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom: ESL: The ESL One Frankfurt Lifestealer set received responses from the community both positive as well as critical. How does community feedback impact the design/creation process?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom3_text: Bounch: Community feedback can affect the result quite a lot, but it’s a difficult line to draw sometimes since everyone has their own opinions on what’s good or not. We take everything into consideration when sharing things publicly for feedback, but we have to be picky on what we implement, not only for aesthetic value but to make sure it is feasible to achieve in game.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom: Bounch: Community feedback can affect the result quite a lot, but it’s a difficult line to draw sometimes since everyone has their own opinions on what’s good or not. We take everything into consideration when sharing things publicly for feedback, but we have to be picky on what we implement, not only for aesthetic value but to make sure it is feasible to achieve in game.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom4_text: Oroboros: It's all about the community - we always submit our stuff to social channels to get feedback. I'm always gauging reactions on items we release, and apply the feedback in the hope of making our current or next creation better. Sometimes we have to take things with a grain of salt as it's easy to be swayed by a vocal few over the silent majority.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom: Oroboros: It's all about the community - we always submit our stuff to social channels to get feedback. I'm always gauging reactions on items we release, and apply the feedback in the hope of making our current or next creation better. Sometimes we have to take things with a grain of salt as it's easy to be swayed by a vocal few over the silent majority.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom5_text: Andrew: It's hard to judge. Most of the time, the feedback you receive will be one of two things, with a very small minority offering anything you can directly use. You create something they don't like, you get a Reddit post saying don't implement this and it gets flamed into the ground, or you create something they do like and you get ASCII spammed.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom: Andrew: It's hard to judge. Most of the time, the feedback you receive will be one of two things, with a very small minority offering anything you can directly use. You create something they don't like, you get a Reddit post saying don't implement this and it gets flamed into the ground, or you create something they do like and you get ASCII spammed.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom6_text: It's less about community feedback and more about studying the trends of which items are loved and which are hated and using that data to your advantage to create something players want. There are always exceptions, but that's usually the case more times than not.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon8textcustom: It's less about community feedback and more about studying the trends of which items are loved and which are hated and using that data to your advantage to create something players want. There are always exceptions, but that's usually the case more times than not.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon9textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 9
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon9textcustom: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 9
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon9textcustom2_text: ESL: Abgesehen von der Erstellung eines Gegenstands müsst ihr euch auch ein bisschen mit der Geschichte des Gegenstands beschäftigen. Lehnt ihr diese an existierende Geschichten in Dota 2 an oder wie macht ihr das?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon9textcustom: ESL: Next to item creation, you also have to come up with a bit of lore around it. Do you base this of existing lore in Dota 2 or do you look elsewhere?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon9textcustom3_text: Bounch: I get most of my ideas for lore from what’s available on the Dota 2 main website, and an awesome thread on dev.dota2 that has breakdowns of every hero and their relationship with the world and other heroes. It’s a great resource and I’ve learned a ton - it’s honestly really fun to see how fleshed out the universe feels, at least considering my original expectations for a game like this. Unfortunately it seems Valve has decided to remove the lore snippets from the store, though I’m hoping it’s only temporary.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon9textcustom: Bounch: I get most of my ideas for lore from what’s available on the Dota 2 main website, and an awesome thread on dev.dota2 that has breakdowns of every hero and their relationship with the world and other heroes. It’s a great resource and I’ve learned a ton - it’s honestly really fun to see how fleshed out the universe feels, at least considering my original expectations for a game like this. Unfortunately it seems Valve has decided to remove the lore snippets from the store, though I’m hoping it’s only temporary.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon9textcustom4_text: Oroboros: It's all about spinning off existing lore! I rarely deviate from Valve's lore, as there's plenty to go off. We always try to tie our submissions to locations and backstory provided by Valve and the community.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon9textcustom: Oroboros: It's all about spinning off existing lore! I rarely deviate from Valve's lore, as there's plenty to go off. We always try to tie our submissions to locations and backstory provided by Valve and the community.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon9textcustom5_text: Andrew: There is a fantastic mega thread on the dev.dota2 which provides everything about the lore for just about anything. While we do look elsewhere, we usually make sure it makes sense in relation to the big picture in which the Dota universe exists.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon9textcustom: Andrew: There is a fantastic mega thread on the dev.dota2 which provides everything about the lore for just about anything. While we do look elsewhere, we usually make sure it makes sense in relation to the big picture in which the Dota universe exists.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 10
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcusto: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 10
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcustom2_text: ESL: An welchem Gegenstand habt ihr am liebsten gearbeitet und was ist euer Lieblingsgegenstand des gesamten Workshops?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcusto: ESL: What's your own favorite item to have worked on or created and which one is your favorite in the entire workshop?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcustom3_text: Bounch: My favorite item I have done is probably our Red Panda “Snaggletooth” courier we did last year. He’s not in yet, but we have our fingers crossed for some day soon! I also quite like our ward “Omij, the Sentinel of Knowledge” and still have a soft spot for my first set, “Ancestor's Pride” for Phantom Lancer.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcusto: Bounch: My favorite item I have done is probably our Red Panda “Snaggletooth” courier we did last year. He’s not in yet, but we have our fingers crossed for some day soon! I also quite like our ward “Omij, the Sentinel of Knowledge” and still have a soft spot for my first set, “Ancestor's Pride” for Phantom Lancer.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcustom4_text: There are SO many excellent entries that I couldn’t pick a single favorite. A few standouts for me though are DonDon’s “Father of Dragons” Dragon Knight set, Oni/Zaphk’s “Blessings of the Eternal Eclipse” Luna set, and Motenai’s “Jewels of the Teardrop Ice” Phantom Lancer set. Again, there’s tons of fantastic stuff out there and I encourage everyone to explore the workshop because you never know what treasure you might find off the front page. Remember to vote!
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcusto: There are SO many excellent entries that I couldn’t pick a single favorite. A few standouts for me though are DonDon’s “Father of Dragons” Dragon Knight set, Oni/Zaphk’s “Blessings of the Eternal Eclipse” Luna set, and Motenai’s “Jewels of the Teardrop Ice” Phantom Lancer set.  Again, there’s tons of fantastic stuff out there and I encourage everyone to explore the workshop because you never know what treasure you might find off the front page. Remember to vote!
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcustom5_text: Oroboros: In terms of an item we worked on, there's a few but the Snaggletooth courier is probably my favorite one yet. The concept just came together seamlessly, we had plenty of time to spend on it and everyone just loved it. As for a set someone else created, the Twin Blades set for Bounty Hunter by Motenai and Vidotto, which hasn't gone in yet unfortunately. Honestly, though, there's so much good stuff waiting to go in from a ton of talented artists that it kind of blows my mind. Too many pending submissions to count.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcusto: Oroboros: In terms of an item we worked on, there's a few but the Snaggletooth courier is probably my favorite one yet. The concept just came together seamlessly, we had plenty of time to spend on it and everyone just loved it. As for a set someone else created, the Twin Blades set for Bounty Hunter by Motenai and Vidotto, which hasn't gone in yet unfortunately. Honestly, though, there's so much good stuff waiting to go in from a ton of talented artists that it kind of blows my mind. Too many pending submissions to count.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcustom6_text: Andrew: My own? Easily Cluckles the Brave, it was more or less my introduction to the workshop and the reason why I'm where I am today. As far as in the whole workshop, that's impossible to answer, there are way too many submissions that are absolutely fantastic and it would be an injustice to pick out just one.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon10textcusto: Andrew: My own? Easily Cluckles the Brave, it was more or less my introduction to the workshop and the reason why I'm where I am today. As far as in the whole workshop, that's impossible to answer, there are way too many submissions that are absolutely fantastic and it would be an injustice to pick out just one.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon11textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 11
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon11textcusto: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 11
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon11textcustom2_text: ESL: Welchen Ratschlag würdet ihr Leuten geben, die selbst mit der Erstellung von Gegenständen anfangen möchten?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon11textcusto: ESL: What would your best advice be to people looking to start creating items themselves?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon11textcustom3_text: Bounch: I would say first to decide what you think you’d enjoy doing most. Learn as much as you can about the subject you decide to pursue and surround yourself with it. There are lots of great learning resources on the internet such as Polycount, Eat 3D, 3dmotive, and Gnomon Workshop. Regardless of which you choose, you can’t go wrong with drawing every day.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon11textcusto: Bounch: I would say first to decide what you think you’d enjoy doing most. Learn as much as you can about the subject you decide to pursue and surround yourself with it. There are lots of great learning resources on the internet such as Polycount, Eat 3D, 3dmotive, and Gnomon Workshop. Regardless of which you choose, you can’t go wrong with drawing every day.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon11textcustom4_text: Oroboros: Figure out ahead of time if you're going to treat it like a hobby or something more serious. Go to Polycount, surround yourself with like-minded creators and do your best. Don't give up after the first submission, expect a wait to get that first item in. It's kind of a tough, ever-evolving scene to break into, but I've learned that persistence pays off eventually.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon11textcusto: Oroboros: Figure out ahead of time if you're going to treat it like a hobby or something more serious. Go to Polycount, surround yourself with like-minded creators and do your best. Don't give up after the first submission, expect a wait to get that first item in. It's kind of a tough, ever-evolving scene to break into, but I've learned that persistence pays off eventually.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon11textcustom5_text: Andrew: Become insane, haha. Consistently doing the same thing over and over and expecting a different result is the only reason I achieved anything. More specific advice, jump on Polycount, search tutorials on YouTube, anything that can advance your skills is what you need to do better yourself. Make sure you find time every day to put into it, whether it's an hour or a whole day - it's way better than nothing.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon11textcusto: Andrew: Become insane, haha. Consistently doing the same thing over and over and expecting a different result is the only reason I achieved anything. More specific advice, jump on Polycount, search tutorials on YouTube, anything that can advance your skills is what you need to do better yourself. Make sure you find time every day to put into it, whether it's an hour or a whole day - it's way better than nothing.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcustom1_text: Interview mit Red Moon Workshop - Teil 12
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcusto: Interview With The Red Moon Workshop pt. 12
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcustom2_text: ESL: Wollt ihr den ganzen Fans eurer Arbeit oder den gerade neu gewonnenen Fans noch etwas sagen?
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcusto: ESL: Is there anything you'd like to say to all the fans of your work or the new ones you've just gained?
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcustom3_text: Bounch: I just want to say thanks to everyone for supporting the workshop and making all of this possible. It’s an incredible new avenue for people to interact and get involved with the game, and for us to be able to contribute content to something we love and see people get enjoyment out of it is an absolute dream. Thank you so much!
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcusto: Bounch: I just want to say thanks to everyone for supporting the workshop and making all of this possible. It’s an incredible new avenue for people to interact and get involved with the game, and for us to be able to contribute content to something we love and see people get enjoyment out of it is an absolute dream. Thank you so much!
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcustom4_text: Oroboros: Thank you to the community for supporting us throughout this interesting journey into uncharted waters. I'd also like to make a plea to anyone reading this to dig a little deeper into the workshop to find fresh submissions from other talented creators and show them your support.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcusto: Oroboros: Thank you to the community for supporting us throughout this interesting journey into uncharted waters. I'd also like to make a plea to anyone reading this to dig a little deeper into the workshop to find fresh submissions from other talented creators and show them your support.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcustom5_text: It's not all about the front page and the top three - there's a ton of really cool work that goes unnoticed, which has always bugged me. And more than anything thanks to Polycount for putting us on the correct path and the helpful artists and individuals who have offered advice and guidance along the way.
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcusto: It's not all about the front page and the top three - there's a ton of really cool work that goes unnoticed, which has always bugged me. And more than anything thanks to Polycount for putting us on the correct path and the helpful artists and individuals who have offered advice and guidance along the way.
Tokens.Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcustom7_text: Folgt der Facebook-Seite von Red Moon Workshop, wenn ihr an zukünftigen Updates, Kosmetika und mehr interessiert seid:
Tokens.[english]Comp_1248_PG_redmoon12textcusto: Be sure to like the Red Moon Workshop Facebook page if you’re interested in seeing future updates, cosmetics and more:
